Reviews.Title: “Basic but clean studio appt”
Reviews.Author: chrisitne
Reviews.Content: Good choice if you want cheap room with no frills. Breakfast was simple but filling, usual toast, pastries, cornflakes, OJ, tea, coffee and hot chocolate. It was a 10 min walk from centre of Madrid and was quiet. No english spoken by staff, so we used sign language!

HotelInfo.Name: Aparthotel Orion
HotelInfo.Address: Diego de Leon 10, 28006 Madrid, Spain
